item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Robin Jones Gunn
item.description: "When in doubt chicken out." -- Robin Jones Gunn

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by A.A. Milne
Elizabeth add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Robin Jones Gunn
item.description: "Then Circled by the golden light of God's Presence and His promise, Paul and Sierra walked side by side along the trail that lead tward the campus and on tward their Future" -- Robin Jones Gunn

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Robin Jones Gunn
item.description: "Take it and be thankful." -- Robin Jones Gunn

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Robin Jones Gunn
item.description: "When one heart opens to another heart, it usually results in love." -- Robin Jones Gunn

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Laura Jensen Walker
item.description: "How do you explain to a nonreader that books aren't just things but treasured friends? Companions?" -- Laura Jensen Walker
